title: [EPIC] beads-workflows v0.1.0
description:
Initial implementation of beads-workflows: TypeScript SDK + CLI daemon for beads issue automation.

## Goals
- Zero-import workflow handlers (.beads/on.*.ts)
- TypeScript SDK (issues, epics, on exports)
- Hybrid I/O (read JSONL, write via bd CLI)
- Background daemon watching for changes
- Convention-based handler execution

## Success Criteria
- Can run `npx beads-workflows` to start daemon
- Can import { issues, epics, on } and use API
- .beads/on.issue.ready.ts executes when issue becomes ready
